description: Brief document describing the requirements for the 3D scanners.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Three Dimensional (3D) Scanners**
====================================

**Reference Number**: WS3885964740-Doc3885986363
--------------------------------------------

**Publication Date**: 2023-03-01
**Closing Date**: 2023-03-22T14:00:00

**Amendment Details**:

*   Amendment Number: 3
*   Amendment Date: 2023-03-21

**Tender Description**:

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) Marine Fish and Invertebrates group is seeking a Standing Offer for the supply, delivery, and provision of training services for various sizes of portable three-dimensional (3D) scanners. The requirement will be as-and-when requested and will be in effect from the issuance date to April 30, 2026.

**Regions of Opportunity**:

*   Burlington
*   Winnipeg
*   Sault Ste. Marie

**Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15567134?extsite=MTU1NjcxMzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15567134?extsite=MTU1NjcxMzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Contact Information**:

Diane Warnell
SPAC/PSPC
diane.warnell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
**Competitive Procurement**: Open Bidding
----------------------------------------

This tender is competitively open for all interested bidders, and the lowest price will be the basis for the selection. 

**Trade Agreements**: The following trade agreements apply to this tender:
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
